Name: Palo Alto Cortex XDR CCP
Author: Microsoft
Description: The [Palo Alto Cortex XDR](https://cortex-panw.stoplight.io/docs/cortex-xdr/branches/main/09agw06t5dpvw-cortex-xdr-rest-api) data connector allows ingesting logs from the Palo Alto Cortex XDR API into Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector is built on Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform. It uses the Palo Alto Cortex XDR API to fetch agents, alerts, incidents, management and endpoint logs and it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview) that parses the received security data into a custom table, thus resulting in better performance.
